attributes.action: pursue tax avoiders/evaders with the same zeal as benefit "thieves".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Obviously I hold no brief for people who claim Social Security benefits falsely but many who do this do so because they are desperate and because benefit rates are so low.  I would alos contend that false benefit claims probably don't cost the Exchequer a very large proportion of the total amount available to it.  In contrast tax evaders/avoiders are very wealthy -by definition since they can afford to employ accountants to tell them of legal ways to avoid paying tax (there shouldn't BE any such loopholes)- and the amount of tax they avoid paying is probably many times greater than the amount wrongly paid out in benefits
